zh_title: 委任法律改革委員會成員

en: The following is issued on behalf of the Law Reform Commission:
The Law Reform Commission (LRC) today (March 22) announced that Ms Melissa Wu has been appointed by the Chief Executive as a new member of the LRC.

Ms Wu, who has substantial experience in providing audit services to multinational companies and listed clients in Hong Kong and the Mainland, replaces Ms Angela Lee following Ms Lee's completion of two three-year terms as an LRC member. The Commission believes that the expertise and extensive experience of Ms Wu in providing audit services, as well as her diverse experience of public service, would benefit the LRC in law reform. The appointment is for three years with effect from March 15, 2018.
The Commission also thanks Ms Lee for her valuable contribution and advice to the LRC over the years.
With this latest appointment, the LRC now comprises the following members:
Mr Robert Y H Pang, SC
The Chief Justice of the Court of Final Appeal (ex-officio member)
zh: 下稿代法律改革委員會發出：
法律改革委員會（法改會）今日（三月二十二日）宣布，行政長官已委任吳麗莎為法改會新成員。
吳麗莎為跨國公司和香港及內地的上市客戶提供審計服務，深具經驗。她接替已在法改會完成兩個三年任期的李慧賢。法改會相信吳麗莎提供審計服務的專業知識及豐富經驗，以及她在公職服務的經驗，將有助法改會推行法律改革工作。有關委任為期三年，由二○一八年三月十五日起生效。
法改會同時感謝李慧賢多年來對法改會的寶貴貢獻。
在上述最新任命後，法改會的成員名單如下︰
終審法院首席法官（當然成員）
法律草擬專員（當然成員）
